snippet.title: Astrå - Fabuloso Games - game trailer
snippet.description:
Get Astrå now! ★ Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fabulosogames.astra ★ iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/astra/id933189224 ★

Inspired by Greek mythology,  Astrå is the adventure of Hemera, the goddess of daylight. Help her fight darkness, and discover the wonders and secrets of the unique Astrå universe.

• Arcade action.
• Unique art, music and gameplay. 
• Designed for touch screen. Simple one touch controls.
• Auto-runner platformer with space physics.
• Go explore, solve small puzzles, and discover secrets.

web: http://www.fabulosogames.com 
twitter: @fabulosogames 
tumblr: http://www.astrathegame.tumblr.com
